name: The Birdhain
description:
You've heard of the Berghain right? No? Ok, fine. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berghain

Got it?  Cool. Well the latest Bitsy Jam: https://itch.io/jam/duck-bitsy is duck-themed. Ducks are birds (right? https://smallpetsite.com/are-ducks-birds-facts/) and I thought I'd make a little pun. Just a little joke. 

So the Birdhain was born. It's a club for birds and they have a duck night. The music throbs in all the right places. 

I want to expand on this theme because it's hilarious, but, I definitely probably won't. 

Made using vanilla Bitsy (https://make.bitsy.org/) and Pixsy by Ruin (https://ruin.itch.io/pixsy).

Thank you for playing!
